Articles.Content:
![eqftuNv.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/eqftuNv.jpg)

Cripes amighty, that's a big picture.
This pic is so awesome XD

Kerbals do have obvious necks. And their space suit isn't part of their body. Everything else is pretty funny. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![kerbal_characters.jpg](http://www.spaceflightonline.net/images/kerbal_characters.jpg)

The neck can be seen without a space suit on as well.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-17T01:38:18Z" title="07/17/2015 01:38  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 17, 2015</time> by GregroxMun**

Fascinating biology. 

Have you determined the etiology of the oculus protrusion and asymmetry.

In other words.

Why do they have bulging and offset peepers?

Who cares! 

Its funny 

Great to have a very imaginative ideas of the anatomy of a Kerbal ! #thumbs up
